title: gccgo: go package names are colliding with names of system libraries
body:
by **m@capitanio.org**: 
commit 581fe6126b6f6db3ae0a939e51427406dc52c802
Date:   Thu Jan 27 11:22:02 2011 +0000
git-svn-id: svn+ssh://gcc.gnu.org/svn/gcc/trunk@169328
138bc75d-0d04-0410-961f-82ee72b054a4

Linking a "package usb" go file gives an error:

gccgo -c usb.go -o usb.o
gccgo usb.o main.go -o test
main.go:6:8: error: /usr/lib/../lib64/libusb.so exists but does not contain any Go
export data
make: *** [test] Error 1
